summary.span: 表示位图帧的容器。

span.span: Represents a container for bitmap frames.

summary.span: 每个位图帧是 。

span.span: Each bitmap frame is a .

summary.span: 此抽象类为所有派生解码器对象提供一组基本功能。

span.span: This abstract class provides a base set of functionality for all derived decoder objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本身并不是 ，而是对象的容器 。 is not a itself; rather, it is a container for objects. 容器中的每个可能都有不同的属性，包括不同的大小、分辨率或调色板。Each in the container can potentially have different attributes, including different sizes, resolutions, or palettes. 除非选择了特定的编解码器，否则 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 将使用自动运行时发现来识别图像的格式，并将其与合适的编解码器匹配。Unless a specific codec is selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses automatic run-time discovery to identify the format of an image and match it with the appropriate codec. 此发现过程允许系统自动发现由开发的编解码器 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)] 。This discovery process allows a codec developed by an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)] to be automatically discoverable by the system. 若要选择特定的编解码器， 应使用派生的或 ，如 类。To select a specific codec, the derived or , such as the class, should be used. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 是支持多个帧的唯一实现的图像格式。and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] are the only implemented image formats that support multiple frames. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法创建给定图像的解码器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a decoder for a given image. 第一个 图像用作控件的源 。The first of the image is used as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapDecoderExample.cs#bitmapdecodercreate)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapDecoderExample.vb#bitmapdecodercreate)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用内置的 打开和解码 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 位图。The following code example demonstrates how to use the built in to open and decode a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap. 生成的用作 元素的 。The resulting is used as the of an element. [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#4)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在 `bitmapStream` 创建解码器后关闭，请使用 cache 选项。Use the cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created. 默认 缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直到需要该位图，并由垃圾回收器处理清理。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法创建给定图像的解码器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a decoder for a given image. 第一个 图像用作控件的源 。The first of the image is used as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreateStream](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapDecoderExample.cs#bitmapdecodercreatestream)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreateStream](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapDecoderExample.vb#bitmapdecodercreatestream)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed
abstract member Finalize : unit -> unit override this.Finalize : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在通过垃圾回收回收 之前，释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法; `Finalize` 在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的方法，除非已通过调用方法禁用了垃圾回收器终止 。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))、 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 图像支持多个框架。Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] images support more than one frame. 此属性返回的任何对象都将被冻结。Any objects returned by this property are frozen. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 作为 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a . MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Thumbnail As BitmapSource

summary.span: 获取一个 ，用于表示位图的缩略图（如果已定义）。

span.span: Gets a that represents the thumbnail of the bitmap, if one is defined.

value.span: 一个 ，用于表示位图的缩略图。

span.span: A that represents a thumbnail of the bitmap.

value.span: 如果未定义任何缩略图，此属性将返回 。

span.span: If no thumbnail is defined, this property returns .
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本机格式均不支持全局缩略图。None of the native formats support global thumbnails. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)]、 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] 支持可使用属性访问的框架级缩略图 。, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] support frame-level thumbnails that can be accessed using the property. 此属性返回的已冻结。The returned by this property is frozen.
